title: Why is Riot making its website hard to navigate?
body:
Things I can no longer access directly:

-I no longer can look directly at Post replies.
-I no longer can directly look at moderation notices.
-You have to look for Community in an obscure sub-category.
-You have to look for Community before you can access Gameplay.
-New flash features are blocked at most workplaces, so you can't even log in to your account.
-No longer get notices when someone replies to you.


So...... Why is that?
